events.title: Community Dinner & Networking
events.description: Join us for our monthly community dinner! Bring a dish to share or just come hungry. Great opportunity to meet new residents and reconnect with the community.

events.title: Remote Work Productivity Workshop
events.description: Learn tips and strategies for maximizing your productivity while working remotely. Led by experienced digital nomads and remote work veterans.

events.title: Founder Fireside Chat
events.description: An intimate conversation with local startup founders sharing their journey, lessons learned, and advice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

events.title: Sunday Morning Yoga
events.description: Start your week right with a relaxing yoga session in our backyard garden. All levels welcome. Mats provided.

events.title: Tech Demo Night
events.description: Community members showcase their projects, side hustles, and latest tech experiments. Come to present or just to be inspired!
